topics.body:
I just had a genius idea how companies can get past a fair chunk of bullshit internet censorship laws by doing what the porn industry is doing right now.

For those of you that don't know what is going on basically in California a law was passed that all porn actors have to wear condoms even though the actors are required to get regular checkups and tested; so what the porn industry did was pack their bags and move to vegas.

What does this have to do with censorship?  Easy decentralize your servers or your company locations.  Country/state <x> wants to ban the production of non-censored porn or ban the sale of say video games?  Just move.  Australia wants to ban the sale of GTA V?  Just sell it from another country.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
